Text: Holy Crap! Apparently I have been Spider-Man this whole time!!
Lazy artist, you say ? Stupid publication, I say.

Haha the concept makes no sense. Either you paste your own face in, which is illogical since spider-man wears a mask OR you paste a picture of you wearing a spider-man mask, which is pointless since they could've just drawn the mask.

It's simple, if you look at the issue, it was designed for a smart phone, presumable the idea is that your camera places your face in the blank spot, much like I believe the Xbox or Playstation camera does for your personal avatar.  

That having been said, this was 4 pages of complete crap that took place towards the end of the Amazing Spider-man movie while trying to make it feel like prequel material.  I recommend that anyone who likes Spider-man avoid this so as not to ruin the franchise.
